ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Jason Stenson, Richard Corsi, Cassandra Moseley, and Linsey Marr for comments on the manuscript. We thank Paul Ward for his graphical contributions.

P.F.H., L.D., and K.V.D.W. conceived of the scope of the article. L.D. and P.F.H. wrote the article, with significant writing contributions from D.A.C. and M.F. P.F.H. developed and created Fig. 1. P.F.H., with outside help, created Fig. 2 and 3. K.V.D.W. and J.A.E. provided significant edits. All authors reviewed the final manuscript.
